## utils package

Light JS/TS utils library.

## Classes

| Class                     | Description                                                                                                                                            |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [Deferred](./Deferred.md) | Promise wrapper that allows to manipulate it more easily by making <code>resolve</code> and <code>reject</code> accessible outside the usual callback. |
| [Subject](./Subject.md)   | Observable implementation that allows multiple observers to watch values.                                                                              |

## Functions

| Function                                    | Description                                                                                         |
| ------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [getIn(obj, key, defaultValue)](./getIn.md) | Allows to get a value deeply in an object without throwing an exception if the path does not exist. |

## Type Aliases

| Type Alias                        | Description                                |
| --------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| [Subscription](./Subscription.md) | Callback that will receive Subject values. |
